review: Keeps disconnecting from wifi, even though the router is standing no more than five feet away in the same room.Also, the Fire TV Stick is always shown as just the stick and the remote, but what they don't show you in the pictures is the rather large power adapter that it cannot work without. I thought maybe it would get enough power from the HDMI connection, but apparently it does not. The fact that the power adapter plugs into the side of the Fire TV Stick also limits the amount of space I have for other HDMI cables in the back of my TV.Even though I got it for $20, it sits without use at all. Best to just get a Roku.

review: Had trouble getting my second Fire TV Stick to work.  (My son-in-law installed the first.)  Knew it was something simple--and it was when there was a space in the WiFi address, I put a space.  No spaces was my problem!
